# Toshinden 2 &amp; Zero Divide Cyrix CPU fixes

#### Written in 1997 for Windows 95.

[Original package](https://defacto2.net/f/b12fb66)

 └┬───∙·                                                                ·∙───┬┘
  │                                                                          │
  │  These are two small 6x86 cyrix fixes, for two razor releases.           │
  │  I downloaded them real fast, like few hours after they were out but I   │
  │  just let them be on zip disk. I finally had time to try them this       │
  │  week-end, before i would burn them and i figured that they were         │
  │  fucking asking for a pentium on my cyrix. So here are those two little  │
  │  Cyrix-fixes, for Toshinden 2 and Zero Divide.                           │
  │  Easy patching to remove such lame hardware check.                       │
  │                                                                 - LGB -  │
  │                                                                          │
 ┌┴─∙·                                                                    ·∙─┴┐
 ││ ■                            iNSTALL NOTES:                            ■ ││
 └┬─∙·                                                                    ·∙─┬┘
  │                                                                          │
  │  Just unrar and run the .com files , blh-t2cf.com for Toshinden 2        │
  │                                      blh-zdcf.com for Zero Divide        │
  │                                                                          │
  │  We also included the .asm source code, feel free to use/modify it :)    │
  │                                                                          │
  │                                                               - MAYHEM - │
  │                                                                          │
 ┌┴───∙·                                                                ·∙───┴┐
